document_data.caption: A map showing Morovar northwest of Lake Mogador.
document_data.name: Morovar
document_data.mainbody: '''Morovar''' was a larger town found in the [[Morov|Barony of Morov]] in [[Damara]].
document_data.Geography: Morovar sat on the eastern bank of the [[Goliad River]] in the southwest corner of Morov.
document_data.Activities:
Once the capital of the barony, Morov was on the decline in the 1350s [[DR]]. This was a direct result of [[Dimian Ree]] moving his seat of power to [[Heliogabalus]]. Many of Morovar's wealthy nobles abandoned the city to follow their lord, taking much of Morovar's spirit with them.

Morovar's lack of a firm ruler left them nearly helpless when faced with a conflict since the local militia was painfully slow to organize.
document_data.Inhabitants: Many of Morovar's citizens felt scorned by their lord's departure and secretly dreamed of allying with [[Brandiar]].
